thread.title: MIchael

author: MIchael
title: MIchael
text:
Michelle Otero ski.com-
Over the years Michelle has booked quite a few trips for me. Michelle makes the process really easy. I send her an email ask her where the snow is , she asks me how many are traveling in my party and the dates I'd like to go.
The rest is history !
Michelle finds the best rates for airfare, place to stay, lift tickets, and transfer vouchers. Michelle knows the best places to ski and snowboard. Ski.com is a one stop shopping place to travel when hitting the mountains!
